sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_L102D ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_DD , CONB_APIN , CONB_DAYS_AMT_SUM , CONB_DD_DDCT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #conbSeilNum# , #conbDd# , #conbApin# , #conbDaysAmtSum# , #conbDdDdctSum# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_L102D SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum# , CONB_DD=#conbDd# , CONB_APIN=#conbApin# , CONB_DAYS_AMT_SUM=#conbDaysAmtSum# , CONB_DD_DDCT_SUM=#conbDdDdctSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum# AND CONB_DD=#conbDd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_L102D WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum# AND CONB_DD=#conbDd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_DD , CONB_APIN , CONB_DAYS_AMT_SUM , CONB_DD_DDCT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_L102D WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum# AND CONB_DD=#conbDd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_DD , CONB_APIN , CONB_DAYS_AMT_SUM , CONB_DD_DDCT_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_L102D WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , CONB_SEIL_NUM DESC , CONB_DD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_L102D WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
